Language.Text:
Hey, here! Here is another writing! And a symbol of the sun ... I think they're showing the way. The Proteans most likely had to abandon another section of the Labyrinth and build a new place in this direction.
Do you mean the tower in the distance?
Yes, we'll finally find something, we'll get to know their culture ...
The trip there is very dangerous however.
... their technologies ...
Looks like a meat grinder.
... their art ...
Stupid!
Rocks and other objects are attracted by magnets. Attention, a stone in motion can kill you. Antimagnetic wall neutralizes effects of the magnet.
